website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour ClutchFit Drive 3 is a good shoe. There’s really nothing outstanding about it. However, all in all, it performs well. It’s comfortable, has responsive cushioning, solid traction, and decent support.At $125, there are better performance sneakers out there (including signature basketball shoes such as the Jordan Why Not Zer0.2 and Nike Kyrie 5). But if you were a fan of the first ClutchFit Drive, then the ClutchFit Drive 3 may just be for you.
pros: Majority of users just love how comfortable and responsive these UA basketball shoes feel
They appreciate that Under Armour brought back its fan-favorite Micro G foam
Traction is excellent on clean and semi-dusty courts, several reported
A lot of buyers commented that the Under Armour ClutchFit Drive 3 has good ankle support
These Under Armour basketball shoes fit perfectly, according to many
A few noted that these Under Armour shoes look good and have cool colorways
The shoes break in easily, nearly all observed
Some said that these high-top basketball sneakers feel good even on the first wear
Several wearers said that they’ll recommend this shoe because of its good performance and quality
cons: A good number of users report that the ClutchFit upper is not breathable
The traction doesn’t perform well on dusty courts, a few commented
A handful of testers noted that the ankle collar is flimsy and does not provide the needed support
A few commented that the toe box scuffed off just after a few games

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I may be dating myself but the last time I bought basketball shoes I was a kid. Remember P.F. Flyers, Keds?? Any way, ago a year ago, while playing racquetball I twisted and sprained my right ankle for the third time. I need a year to heal. When I came back I was really nervous about playing again and was wearing a bulky ankle with my racquetball court shoes. I couldn't find a decent high top racquetball shoe anywhere. A friend suggested using a basketball court shoe. The Under Armour Clutch fit shoes is the best. It really hugs my ankle and I get great support. I would definitely recommend these to anyone playing a "court" sport.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Dee

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Adidas, Nike, Reebox, And1 and Fila, but these are the most comfortable pair of basketball shoes I've ever owned. Strongly recommend - good ankle support and cushion, enough toebox room and don't squeeze your arch, no weird mesh to come apart after a couple months (looking at you, Nike). And for the price, they're a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: so happy they make his size because I go to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these shoes for my grandson because they are very reasonably priced and he really likes this brand, so happy they make his size because I go to the mall and can't find his size and if I do find his size they are no where near as nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I've ever owned.... an I own A LOT !
customer_reviews.author: Kristjan Pall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for basketball
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed new basketball shoes so I ordered these. He said they are amazingly comfortable! He has fractured his ankle x3 and sometimes playing is painful, but these shoes are very supportive. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kamesha Fontenette

customer_reviews.title: Look much better in person than in the photo
customer_reviews.text: these are very impressive appearance-wise. Look much better in person than in the photo. the gray is actually a silver, metallic they have held up really well even though my son is very hard on shoes the laces are plenty long and so is the tongue
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes. Teens love em.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 17 yr old son before Christmas. He loves them. He wears them everyday. He is hard on shoes and these are holding up nice. He said kids his age want some like his. I just wished I could get him to wear socks more often. Drives me nuts when he don't wear them. Uggh.
customer_reviews.author: Debrina Maria

customer_reviews.title: Comforable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 year old daughter. We went with men's do it no cute sizing available in women's. She absolutely LOVES them. She said that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug7

customer_reviews.title: Look assume and my boys loves them. Have not ...
customer_reviews.text: Look assume and my boys loves them. Have not noticed any sore feet or he has never complained that his feet are hot. Which is important during tournament weekends when he wears them 6-7 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Shara Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I received it but little disappointed one looks like little used (could be someone tried it on) other one brand new otherwise fits perfectly and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: K C.

customer_reviews.title: pre Worn Shoes - photos as I took them out o the shipping box..
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was used. It had wear and dirt between the treads on the bottom. The laces were also fully laced. the outer edges were worn down showing person wearing them .other than that the shoe itself is perfect. If it were a new shoe, i would have said 5 stars...they fit well and are comfortable so a product, there are nice... but definitely pre-worn..... maybe a customer who did not like them after few hours use? I dont know. If it were a store i could drive too, i would return them...
customer_reviews.author: Vijay patel

customer_reviews.title: Better than Jordans'
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. These are narrow so order at least a size bigger than you usually wear. These are more comfortable than my Jordans'.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Siddiqui

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: But a beautiful shoe just a size smaller on my foot

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. My son has a wide foot and has trouble finding basketball shoes. These fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Fit great. Comfortable shoe with the perfect cushoning and stability
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Comfortable shoe with the perfect cushoning and stability. Non slip sole and look awesome. Definitely recommend these. The size was accurate for all other under armour shoes i have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Casias

customer_reviews.title: Really like the red and white meshed together
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were dope! Really like the red and white meshed together. Unfortunately they were way too big. But I'm not an 11
customer_reviews.author: robbyrobb602

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you plan on sitting the bench.
customer_reviews.text: Hey, the shoes look great, but that's where the positives end. My son wore these for less than 1 month before they started to rip out in the toe. On top of that, the grip is horrible. He was sliding all over the floor--jump stops and quick v-cuts are nearly impossible. Good shoes if you plan on seeing limited action, but not if you plan on playing any type of ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy G.

customer_reviews.title: Super baller fit
customer_reviews.text: I've played basketball for almost 20 years, and I will say this is one of the only pair of b-ball shoes I've ever owned that felt great on the first wear. These shoes give a bounce and lift that my arthritic knees appreciate. I usually wear 10.5 but ordered 11 and they're perfect. I didn't really care for the color selection so ended up ordering the black with white tips. I wish they made an all black show for this series. I'm keeping them for indoor so hopefully they won't get too dirty
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Bought these shoes in Mid February they started falling apart ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes in Mid February they started falling apart today (mid June). I would expect them to last longer, they have only been worn on indoor basketball courts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can you say, Under Armor is the bomb for a 14 year old kid!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son loves them. They are exactly the color shown.

customer_reviews.title: Little snug at first but since they've been street broken they're fine. Very comptible as my dad would say
customer_reviews.text: They were. Little snug at first but since they've been street broken they're fine. Very comptible as my dad would say.

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them much but they seem to have good ankle support.

customer_reviews.title: UA favs.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the shoes, from the gorgeous color scheme to the support inside the shoe. The cost was reasonable and delivery was quick. Truly a satisfied customer.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Great grip on the basketball court

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe

customer_reviews.text: Tracking indicated that the pkge would be delivered between the 19th and 28th. It arrived on time on the 20th. Everything was fine and the sneakers looked and fit great and the price was also an excellent deal.

customer_reviews.title: but man I sure do look good on the court in them

customer_reviews.title: HELP
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Nov 2, & they already have a tear on the side of shoe! I would really like you to ship us a new pair, my son likes them otherwise!

customer_reviews.title: Double check your shoe color
customer_reviews.text: They fit great. But we got blue shoes. We were expecting black ones... So that was our only issue.

customer_reviews.title: The shoes feel good, maybe i should've gotten them a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel good, maybe i should've gotten them a half size bigger than my regular size but it doesn't hurt my toes while I'm playing, besides that, feel like i have good support when i land on them and they're light

customer_reviews.title: Great all round bball shoe

customer_reviews.title: My son likes the cushioning on the inside.

customer_reviews.title: These are not as good as the old Under Armour Charge basketball shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are not as good as the old Under Armour Charge basketball shoes, but they are pretty good. I like a really high, high-top and these come up higher than most. They run a little narrow, but not as narrow as Nike's.

customer_reviews.title: it's hard to tell from pics but it would be good if they add how it fits in there description
customer_reviews.text: I guess these sneaks run tight..it's hard to tell from pics but it would be good if they add how it fits in there description..if I known Instead of 7.5 I would of order an 8...don't like sneaks that wraps on my feet that snug fit might be good for runners but not for me I like oldschool comfort I don't like to Battel them off my feet...when I want them off I should be able to take off with a quick tap on the heelso n they're off...not these ..I got to loosen the strings all the way other than that the colors are beautiful all the girls can't avoid looking...because of that 5 stars for the ladies

customer_reviews.text: Good looking & well made shoe. Too narrow in the box area even when ordering a size larger. Probably good for narrow feet.
